data.title: Denver Nuggets: Breaking News, Rumors & Highlights
data.meta_description: Denver Nuggets rumors, news and videos from the best sources on the web. Sign up for the Nuggets newsletter!
data.text:
Ex-Denver Nuggets Coach George Karl Reacts To LeBron James News

LeBron James is currently playing for Team USA, who will participate in the 2024 Olympics in Paris. James is attempting to win his third career Gold Medal.

Denver Nuggets NBA Champion Reportedly Joining Philadelphia 76ers

The Philadelphia 76ers have had a very busy NBA offseason. Signing Paul George to a maximum contract in free agency, Philadelphia has also reached agreements with Caleb Martin, Andre Drummond, Kelly Oubre, Eric Gordon, Kyle Lowry, KJ Martin, and others.

Denver Stiffs Show: The Denver Nuggets wrap up Summer League and finish filling out their roster

On this episode of the Denver Stiffs Show Zach Mikash and Gordon Gross break down the Denver Nuggets performance in Summer League before talking about the final additions to the Nuggets roster.

Denver Nuggets: Russell Westbrook Did 1 Surprising Thing to Join Nikola Jokic

The Denver Nuggets know they must make radical changes to their roster to improve their chances of making it back to the NBA Finals. Their seven-game series loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves in the second round of the playoffs showed that the team had to address some changes to their roster.

Denver Nuggets: Playoff Hero Jamal Murray Lands On ‘Most Overrated’ List

The Denver Nuggets wouldn’t have won an NBA title without point guard Jamal Murray. He was an important weapon for the Nuggets during their title run. One can also make the argument that Denver probably would have lost in the first round of the 2024 NBA Playoffs to the Los Angeles Lakers without Murray’s heroics.

Giannis Antetokounmpo's Viral Post After Battle vs. Nikola Jokic

With the Paris Olympic Games right around the corner, basketball teams are playing preparation games to get ready for Group Play. Denver Nuggets star Nikola Jokic and Serbia faced off against Milwaukee Bucks star Giannis Antetokounmpo and Greece on Monday, with Jokic leading his team to victory.

Denver Nuggets’ Nikola Jokic Leads List of Top-Ranked Players for 2024 Olympics

Nikola Jokic is at the core of everything good happening for the Denver Nuggets. The Serbian big man has played well for the Nuggets this season and was a key reason why the team managed to force the Minnesota Timberwolves to a Game 7.

Russell Westbrook Issues Heartfelt Goodbye To The LA Clippers

Russell Westbrook was traded to the Utah Jazz by the Los Angeles Clippers in a deal that allowed the Clippers to land Kris Dunn. Westbrook was promptly waived by the Jazz and signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets.

Minnesota Timberwolves Announce Signing of Former Denver Nuggets Player

NBA free agency has already seen many impactful players switch teams. With most of the top free agents having signed new deals, teams are now looking at different options to fill out their roster.

Skip Bayless warns Nuggets of potential ‘disaster’ over Paul Pierce’s proposal

After falling short of expectations a year after winning their first NBA Championship, the Denver Nuggets are trying to bolster a roster that fell short of expectations this season.

Nuggets Sign College Sharpshooter To Two-Way Deal

Spencer Jones is joining the Denver Nuggets. According to Bennett Durango of the Denver Post, the undrafted Stanford forward has agreed to a two-way deal with the team.

Denver Nuggets Reportedly Sign New Free Agent

The Denver Nuggets are expected to sign veteran guard Russell Westbrook after the nine-time All-Star clears waivers. Westbrook was traded from the LA Clippers to the Utah Jazz, and will sign with the Nuggets once he hits free agency.

Denver Nuggets Reportedly Sign Elite 3-Point Shooter

Spencer Jones is coming off another productive year of college basketball for Stanford. He finished the season with averages of 11.7 points, 4.1 rebounds, 2.0 assists and 1.4 steals per contest while shooting 43.8% from the field and 40.9% from the three-point range in 25 games.

Denver Nuggets Reportedly Signing NBA Legend

Russell Westbrook is one of the best players in NBA history. On Thursday, ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski reported that Westbrook is being traded to the Utah Jazz (who will waive him).

Nuggets’ Michael Malone: Team On Lookout For Backcourt Help

Denver Nuggets coach Michael Malone left nothing to the imagination when asked what his team is looking for heading into next season. “Somebody to play behind Jamal Murray,” Malone said during an NBA Summer League game on NBA TV, via RealGM.
